content: *materials * large button 1 or larger depending on your gauge sewing needle & coordinating thread optional small piece of cardboard or plastic canvas to stabilize bottom of bag *stitches * chain slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease half_double_crochet rev single_crochet *difficulty * medium note entire project is worked holding two strands of yarn together this project will use between 8 and 12 ounces of each of 2 colors of yarn
